entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Placentia
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 01:11 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 6.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Argentia 01:30 AM NST Saturday 14 January 2023
Temperature: 6.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Dewpoint: 4.4°C
Wind: SSE 72 km/h gust 89 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Rain or snow. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening then changing to rain near midnight. Rainfall amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming south 40 gusting to 60 this evening then increasing to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 7 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Showers. High 9.
entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches developing in the afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 50 gusting to 80 in the afternoon. High 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.summary: Showers. Fog patches. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature steady near 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
